bug.author: ns1123
bug.summary: Alluxio does not initFromBackup correctly when specifying local path
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: master branch Describe the bug Alluxio's restore from backup using the alluxio-start.sh -i <Backup-URI> does not work as intended. The master takes any user-specified URI and strips it of scheme/authority before checking the root UFS for the backup. This prevents users from specifying a local path using 'file:///'. To Reproduce Try to restore from a backup file in a non-root UFS URI Expected behavior Restoring from backup should allow either Root UFS URI or Local URI based on user specified scheme. Urgency HIGH
This used to work before the changes in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/9808>#9808</denchmark-link> . Unit tests should be added here to prevent breaking changes like this in the future.
